job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* DiscoverCustomersPartners
     * Databricks PlatformIntegrations and DataPricingOpen Source
     * Databricks for IndustriesCross Industry SolutionsMigration & DeploymentSolution Accelerators
     * Training and CertificationEventsBlog and PodcastsGet HelpDive Deep
     * CompanyCareersPressSecurity and Trust
     * Ready to get started?
       Pre-sales Solutions Engineer (Data Engineer or Data Science/ML, Cloud)

   Amsterdam, Netherlands

   Req ID FEQ325R52

   At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   You will be reporting to the Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.
job_details.full_text:
Pre-sales Solutions Engineer (Data Engineer

* DiscoverCustomersPartners
     * Databricks PlatformIntegrations and DataPricingOpen Source
     * Databricks for IndustriesCross Industry SolutionsMigration & DeploymentSolution Accelerators
     * Training and CertificationEventsBlog and PodcastsGet HelpDive Deep
     * CompanyCareersPressSecurity and Trust
     * Ready to get started?
       Pre-sales Solutions Engineer (Data Engineer or Data Science/ML, Cloud)

   Amsterdam, Netherlands

   Req ID FEQ325R52

   At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   You will be reporting to the Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on pre-sales activities, client relationship building, and demonstrating existing platforms rather than core AI/ML development or engineering. While it mentions 'Data Science/ML' and 'Spark programming', the primary tasks involve advising on architecture and design, authoring reference architectures, and supporting sales, which aligns more with a solutions engineering role than a dedicated ML or GenAI Engineer.

phrases.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand how technical solutions contribute to the client's business objectives and value proposition.

phrases.phrase: help customers solve their complex data challenges
phrases.justification: This highlights the requirement to understand customer problems from a business perspective and map technical capabilities to solutions.

phrases.phrase: achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward
phrases.justification: This emphasizes aligning technical efforts with the strategic and operational goals of the customer's business.

phrases.phrase: Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design
phrases.justification: Advising on architecture and design implies understanding the business needs that drive these technical decisions.
Mentions of platform integrations and data suggest involvement with data flow and infrastructure, core to data engineering.

phrases.phrase: Databricks for IndustriesCross Industry SolutionsMigration & DeploymentSolution Accelerators
phrases.justification: This implies understanding data solutions across various industries and the processes for migration and deployment, which often involves data engineering.
Spark is a key tool in data engineering and big data processing, and hands-on evaluation implies working with data pipelines and transformations.

phrases.phrase: Data Engineer or Data Science/ML, Cloud
phrases.justification: Explicitly mentions Data Science/ML, indicating potential involvement with modeling, though the primary focus seems to be pre-sales.

phrases.phrase: integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications
phrases.justification: This involves connecting different software systems and platforms, a common software development task.

phrases.phrase: authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications
phrases.justification: Creating demo applications requires software development skills to showcase platform capabilities.
Highlights the need to work effectively with colleagues and clients.

phrases.phrase: collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect
phrases.justification: Directly states the requirement for teamwork with other roles.

phrases.phrase: Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect
phrases.justification: Indicates a need for continuous learning and growth in both technical and client-facing skills.

phrases.phrase: help customers solve their complex data challenges
phrases.justification: Focuses on identifying and resolving customer issues using technical expertise.
Implies tailoring approaches to specific client problems.
Suggests taking initiative and being proactive in client engagements.
Indicates a need for new ideas and approaches.
Directly calls for a proactive and self-starting attitude.
